`,(0,s.jsxDEV)(r.pre,{children:(0,s.jsxDEV)(r.code,{children:`import Image from "next/image";\r
import Container from "../../components/Container";\r
import portfolios, { filters } from "../../data/portfolios";\r
\r
const Portfolio = () => {\r
  return (\r
    <Container>\r
      <div className="mt-10 flex flex-col shadow-[0_1px_1px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,0.08)]">\r
        <ul className="flex justify-around">\r
          {filters.map((filter) => (\r
            <li\r
              className={"h-14 flex items-center px-4 uppercase font-bold "}\r
              key={filter}\r
            >\r
              {filter}\r
            </li>\r
          ))}\r
        </ul>\r
      </div>\r
      <section className="cd-gallery mt-10 pt-10">\r
        <div className="flex flex-wrap justify-start box-content max-w-screen-lg">\r
          {portfolios.map((port, idx) => (\r
            <div\r
              key={\`port \${idx}\`}\r
              className={\r
                "w-full sm:w-1/2 lg:w-1/3 my-4 flex items-center justify-center "}\r
            >\r
              <div className="shadow-[0_1px_2px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)]">\r
                <Image\r
                  src={port.imgsrc}\r
                  alt={\`Image \${idx + 1}\`}\r
                  width={300}\r
                  height={390}\r
                />\r
              </div>\r
            </div>\r
          ))}\r
        </div>\r
      </section>\r
    </Container>\r
  );\r
};\r
\r
export default Portfolio;\r

`,(0,s.jsxDEV)(r.pre,{children:(0,s.jsxDEV)(r.code,{children:`import Image from "next/image";\r
import Container from "../../components/Container";\r
import portfolios, { filters } from "../../data/portfolios";\r
import { useState } from "react";\r
\r
const Portfolio = () => {\r
  const [selectedFilter, setSelectedFilter] = useState("all");\r
  const handleFilterClick = (selectedType: string) => {\r
    setSelectedFilter(selectedType);\r
  };\r
\r
  return (\r
    <Container>\r
      <div className="mt-10 flex flex-col shadow-[0_1px_1px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,0.08)]">\r
        <ul className="flex justify-around">\r
          {filters.map((filter) => (\r
            <li\r
              className={\r
                "h-14 flex items-center px-4 uppercase font-bold " +\r
                (selectedFilter === filter\r
                  ? "text-purple-900 shadow-[0_2px_0px_0px_rgba(65,48,124,1)]"\r
                  : "")\r
              }\r
              key={filter}\r
              onClick={() => handleFilterClick(filter)}\r
            >\r
              {filter}\r
            </li>\r
          ))}\r
        </ul>\r
      </div>\r
      <section className="cd-gallery mt-10 pt-10">\r
        ...\r
      </section>\r
    </Container>\r
  );\r
};\r
\r
export default Portfolio;\r
